actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_sumtotal as (SELECT video_id,created_time,MAX(cast(total_video_views as decimal)) as total_video_view
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
WHERE view_date = '{{moment().add(-1,'day')}}':: date
group by video_id,created_time),
CTE_view_date as (SELECT video_id,created_time,total_video_views
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view 
WHERE view_date = '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
group by video_id,created_time,total_video_views)
select sum(CTE_sumtotal.total_video_view - cast(CTE_view_date.total_video_views as decimal)) as count_currentmonth 
from CTE_sumtotal full join CTE_view_date on CTE_sumtotal.video_id=CTE_view_date.video_id
